name: CTA Box
description: Contained CTA box with border, icon or image, and centered button. Perfect for inline content sections or sidebar calls-to-action.

description.fallback: Join our community and start seeing results immediately.

tailwind_classes.box_default: bg-gradient-to-br from-primary-50 to-white rounded-2xl p-8 text-center
tailwind_classes.box_bordered: bg-white border-2 border-primary-200 rounded-2xl p-8 text-center hover:border-primary-300 transition-colors
tailwind_classes.icon_container_circle: w-16 h-16 mx-auto mb-6 flex items-center justify-center rounded-full bg-primary-100 text-primary-600
tailwind_classes.icon_container_square: w-16 h-16 mx-auto mb-6 flex items-center justify-center rounded-lg bg-primary-100 text-primary-600
tailwind_classes.headline: text-2xl md:text-3xl font-heading font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4
tailwind_classes.description: text-base md:text-lg text-gray-600 mb-6 max-w-2xl mx-auto
